sentences.en: A short blast on the ship's siren warned the dockyard staff ashore.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的短笛声警告修船所的员工上岸.

sentences.en: Before long ship sank, misfortune of on this young woman and dockyard 1500 much people dies.
sentences.cn: 不久轮船沉没了, 这位年轻的妇女和船厂上1500多人不幸遇难.

sentences.en: Please show me the Classification Certificate and the dockyard report.
sentences.cn: 请给我看看船级证书和船厂报告.

sentences.en: So far the academy has done a lot of research work for the Foochow Dockyard.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止,学术界对福州船政局已经做了大量的研究.

trans.tran_en: a place where ships are repaired or built
